attributes.action: Stop low emission zone taxation on petrol and diesel cars
attributes.additional_details: Stop the scheme as its unfairly aimed at forcing older cars off the road
attributes.background: Stop taking advantage of drivers of older vehicles by attempting to force them into buying electric vehicles using daily taxation as the weapon

rejection.details:
Decisions about low emission zones are a matter for individual local authorities, not the Government or Parliament, but we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Revoke local government powers to charge CAZ, LEZ, and ULEZ: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599985
